page.title: 14 Pets
page.content: Our work investigated the ownership of{pets}in the immediate area of Saltshouse school in East Hull. We sent out 150 questionnaires and 60 people had{pets}.Here are the results; 29{dogs},11{cats},6 birds, 5 rabbits, 5 fish, 2 hamsters/gerbils and 1 guinea-pig. The most popular tinned food for{cats}was Whiskas, for{dogs} Pedigree Chum. The average age for{ {dogs}is 5yrs, for{cats}6yrs, for birds 3yrs. We found out that the most common complaint was that of{dogs} fouling footways. Results of interviews with owners of 2{dogs}:- Names - Sheba and Pokey, Sleep - cushions, 4 & 3 years. Pokey - Shelty ,Sheba - Collie. No long-term illnesses. Had Pokey since a puppy and Sheba from a friend.{Dog}food cost - Â£5 per week.
